page.title: 16Leisure Activities
page.content: Many young people go to the Rothbury Sports Club which is a well organised place with lots of facilities. There is a choice of snooker,pool,football, badminton, weight training, gymnastics, tennis and cricket. At the beginning of the year it costs three pounds for membership then each time you go it costs only twenty five pence. If you are not a member it costs one pound for each visit. There is a regular disco night for children aged 9 to 16 and it is from 1900 hrs. to 2200 hrs. during the summer months. The disco is on a Friday night night and I like to leave with my friends at 2100 hrs. and get some chips to eat in the park. There is also a dance for older people but it does not finish until very late.
